name: Secret Agent: Cold War Espionage
storyline:
Get ready for a wild ride, secret agent! You'll be on the edge of your seat as you embark on a mini spy game filled with heart-pounding action and exciting missions. Your goal? To stop a nefarious super villain from taking over the world! From exotic locations to glamorous hotels and swanky casinos, you'll jet-set around the globe in pursuit of the legendary Royale Diamond.

Set in the groovy and dangerous world of 1969, this retro-inspired adventure will transport you back in time to the height of the Cold War. With its gorgeous green sepia-tone visuals, you'll feel like you're living in a classic spy film. Keep your eyes peeled for nods to your favorite spy games and movies as you use your cunning and resources to outsmart your enemies and save the world from certain doom!
summary: An mini action and adventure comedy third person shooter set during the cold war.
